nodes.text: Invest Wisely was a propaganda poster created by Tarnab sandsculptor Tantagru Motts-Danel for the InterGalactic Banking Clan, based on a design by representative Rush Clovis. It depicted two Muun members of the banking clan in silhouette watching a Munificent-class Star Frigate in orbit of an orange-colored planet, upon and beneath which contained the statements "Invest Wisely" and "Invest In Tomorrow" respectively, displayed in High Galactic, alongside a smaller font at the very bottom, which read "A Message From the Intergalactic Banking Clan."
